titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that all 50 States should include the events of the September 11th terrorist attacks in the curriculum of elementary and secondary schools so that people in the United States may never forget that fateful day.

Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that all 50 States should include the events of the September 11th terrorist attacks in the curriculum of elementary and secondary schools so that people in the United States may never forget that fateful day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that all 50 states should include the study of the events of the September 11th terrorist attacks in the curriculum of elementary and secondary schools.
